snippet.title: Polymega Gameplays - Fluid [PlayStation - PAL]
snippet.description:
Fluid (known in France as "Sub" and "Depth" in Japan) is not exactly a "game", but more of an experimental interactive sound lab that enables you to compose infinite music sequences covering all genres of dance music. Navigate this incredible ambient world and access over 600 samples, an entire studio of audio effects, an 8-track mixing desk and an interactive light show.

Fluid (C) Sony Interactive Entertainment
Published by Sony Interactive Entertainment
Developed by Opus Corp.
BIOS Used: Polymega BIOS

#retrogames #retrogaming #polymega #polymegagameplays #ps1 #psx #psone #playstation sub #fluid #depthfirstsearch 

FUN FACT: Fluid was part of a series of rhythm games by Opus Corp, known as SweepStation. The other games in the trilogy are Beat Planet Music and Groove Jigoku V.
